Articles.Content:
It would me much simpler if I knew what contracts I had active so that I can make a test build tailored to the contracts without having to save, go to the overview screen, review and try to memorize the contracts, then go back to building again and hope I remember.

When certain tests require certain speed and height requirements, I adjust my staging accordingly.

This is needlessly difficult since I can't just view the contracts on the same screen.
As far as I can recall you can see your available contracts by clicking on one of the buttons to the bottom right of the screen in both the VAB and the SPH.
You can, just click this button at any moment:

Also, a little known feature in the editor or in flight is that after you open this window you can grab the bar on the border of the contract window and drag it to make it longer.

Cheers,

~Claw
